exp1.title: Software Developer - CO-OP
exp1.description:
• Enabled centralized databases management within the same UI by devoloping a WPF desktop application using OOP and the MVVM architecture to streamline multi-database interactions and enhance user workflow efficiency.
• Implemented NUnit tests by deploying database environments in Docker-based VMs to validate added methods.
• Improved SQL query performance by creating partitioned and indexed configurations, achieving a 20% reduction in execution time as measured through custom benchmarking tests and fully documented for future optimization.

exp2.title: Software Developer - Intern
exp2.description:
• Automated real-time data manipulation workflows using Node.js, node-cron, and Axios, enabling reliable collection, validation, and storage of environmental data retrieved from external APIs.
• Designed a responsive frontend with React, HTML, and CSS, ensuring reusability and cross-platform compatibility to visualize farming data and support informed irrigation decisions.

exp3.title: Tutor
exp3.description:
• Provided personalized math tutoring which helped me learning various teaching methods to suit individual learning styles and needs.
• Developed effective communication strategies and learned how to interact with children in a way that made complex math concepts understandable, using clear explanations, visual aids, and engaging methods to cater to their individual learning styles. 
• Covered various math topics including simple and more complex themes arithmetic, algebra, geometry, and calculus, ensuring thorough understanding and proficiency.
• Assisted with homework assignments, exam preparation, and supplementary learning materials.
• Monitored progress and adjusted teaching methods as needed to optimize learning outcomes.
• Received positive feedback from students and their parents for improvements in grades and overall understanding of mathematical concepts.
